attributes.action: leave to remain in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop deportation for miss p dube 2 south africa, has been a victim of injustice, unsrupulous individual frouded her passport& thousand pound.  willing to continue studies, white british partner. has diploma in organisation behaviour wants to continue business degree. feel treated unfarely.failed by the system.frustrated some have indefinate leave to remain & are drug dealer depending on goverment money. no claimes frm the goverment. has bupa cover, private pension,life insuarence, cat. kids in africa.elder son starting univesity. no given any help. feel descriminated, rights violeted.how many britsh are deported from south africa. very hurt and disapointed.partener diagonised of a critical illness am his carer. mortgaged recently. can not sell till 5yr period very much in dept. stable relation ship want to marry soon. partner convelencing 8 months now. no help from the goverment.depressed at pressent need help. just a slice of happiness.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
